title: Angel Heart
description: There's a reason Dean calls his lover 'Angel.' But Jay's thoughts are far from angelic. He must stop his sister interfering in their relationship ... and ask if Dean's remembered to pack the strawberry lube for the weekend.[Publisher's Note: This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find objectionable: Male/male sexual situations.] Previous book: Snow Angel.
author: Sharon Maria Bidwell
